markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs=""
>
[Gluttonous Spear](/Equipment.aspx?ID=788)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 60</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The head of this _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)_ is wrapped in greasy hide, and its head resembles a thick, clawed finger. On a critical hit, the target is [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 minute, and you gain 1d8 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gluttonous Spear
